com.mygdx.game.ui

Class UIEquipmentMenu.Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.ui.UIComponent
      • com.mygdx.game.ui.UIEquipmentMenu.Item
  • Enclosing class:
    UIEquipmentMenu

    private class UIEquipmentMenu.Item
extends UIComponent
    Represents an item of equipment in the UIEquipmentMenu.
